content: **update 2/2/10 ** pdf is now available and includes three strap variations with another to come **note ** inspired by grandmother s favorite dishcloth 1 and simple baby bib 2 gauge is not all that important just make sure you re getting something vaguely close to the recommended number each bib takes around 1 oz of worsted cotton yarn and any worsted cotton yarn lion cotton lily sugar n cream or peaches n cream will work 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/grandmothers-favorite 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/simple-baby-bib
